title: Join Us
---

We welcome collaborators and applicants interested in **AI-enabled multihazard forecasting,
early warning systems, and response**.

## What we work on
- Multihazard and cascading event modelling
- Machine learning for hazard detection and forecasting
- Uncertainty-aware prediction and evaluation
- End-to-end warning pipelines and decision support
- Open tools, reproducible science, and real-world impact

## Who we are looking for
### PhD / MSc students
Strong quantitative background (e.g., ML, statistics, physics, engineering, geoscience) and interest in hazards/resilience.

### Postdocs
Evidence of independent research, strong writing, and a clear agenda aligned with our themes.

### Research software / engineering
Experience with ML tooling, data pipelines, and reproducibility.
